casebody.data:
CLAY
v.
SHRIVER ALLISON COURTLEY CO. 2018-1359 Supreme Court of Ohio. February 20, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

APPEALS NOT ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW Appellees' motion to dismiss denied. Stewart, J., dissents and would accept the cause on proposition of law No. I. O'Connor, C.J., would deny appellees' motion to dismiss as moot.
